page.title: 16Dunmore Old Peoples Home
page.content: Dunmore has 22 staff who all enjoy their work. Dunmore was given to the Hepburn family in 1944. Until 1963,it was used as a maternity home when it became an eventide home. The oldest lady at Dunmore is Mrs. Watson who is 97 years old and has been a resident at Dunmore for 4 years. The oldest man is Mr. Hopper who has been at Dunmore for a year.The longest serving resident is Mr. Maeer who has been there for 15 years. They have set times for meals, with breakfast starting at 8.30,mid_morning coffee at 10.00, lunch at 12.15., tea at 4.30., and supper at 7.00. They go to bed whenever they wish The officer is Major Ingram and the managers are Mr. and Mrs. Marriot.
